items.title: Some ant architects design a colony to cut the risk of disease. Humans, take note!
items.description: One kind of tiny ant can serve as a monumental example for how to keep members of a community safe from pathogens. A new study shows how they do it.

items.title: Cannabis blunts back pain in 2 new studies

items.title: Can collagen supplements improve your skin? Here's what the research shows

items.title: Grab the goggles. Pickleball eye injuries are on the rise
items.description: Safety precautions haven't caught up with enthusiasm for the sport. Researchers call for a new push for eye-ware.
